title: Meet the Midland
creator_credit: Humphrey Swingler, Greenpark Productions, Midlands Bank and Daniel Ingram
brief_description: An account of everyday business conducted by one of Britain’s leading banks. Activities are illustrated through a series of stories woven around different clients and their problems. In this way, sequences describe many of the facilities offered by the bank - including general cheque clearing services; deposit and loan accounts for individuals and business houses, and specialised assistance given by the overseas trade promotion department.
